actions.name: create-row
actions.description: Creates a new row in the selected table.

actions.name: find-row
actions.description: Find specific rows in the selected table using a column match search.

actions.name: get-row
actions.description: Retrieves a single row by specified ID.

actions.name: get-table
actions.description: Get structure and details of a specific table (e.g., columns, schema).

actions.name: list-tables
actions.description: List tables in a selected document.

actions.name: update-row
actions.description: Updates an existing row in the selected table.

actions.name: upsert-row
actions.description: Creates a new row or updates an existing one if it matches key columns.

triggers.name: new-row-created
triggers.description: Triggers when a new row is added to the selected table.
